column1: #text=If you love riding bikes when the weather starts getting better an important thing to know is how to repair your tire if you encounter a flat .
#text=Head on over to your local auto shop and find a patch kit , and make sure to invest in an air pump if you do n't have one .
#text=Sometimes the bike tire will go flat by losing air due to weather conditions .
#text=If this is your case , simply unscrew the cap and pump more air into the tire .
#text=If you have a puncture in a tire then you will need to try patching .
#text=By using the kit you just purchased you can find the problem area , install a mesh patch over it , and use the kit to fuse it to the tire .
#text=Once it has been applied you can fill the tire with air and enjoy your bike again .
#text=If the tire is still losing air then you will unfortunately need to invest in a new tire .
